alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Clarendon; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:04PM EDT until June 17 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... East central Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Aiken County in central South Carolina... Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 704 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Gadsden to 12 miles east of Aiken State Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Denmark, Brookdale, McEntire Air Base, St. Matthews, Summerton, Bowman, Eastover, Elloree, Santee State Park, Orangeburg County Airport, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Gadsden, Poinsett State Park, Edisto Gardens, Santee and Swansea. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 127 and 164. Interstate 95 between mile markers 90 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Clarendon; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter
